fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Environment, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
Dossiers in the area of 
- (poultry) breeding 
- health and welfare of animals, particularly poultry, including different rearing systems and appropriate use of antibiotics; 
- (negotiating) trade agreements 
- sanitary and veterinary trade issues 
- Food Safety 
- Sustainability in the broad sense including efficient use of natural resources, emissions to air, soil and water, health and welfare of poultry, food and economy
organisation_name: Association of the European Poultry Breeders (EPB)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: European guide to good air transport of hatching eggs and day-old-chicks, toegankelijk via website
